labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails: AssertionError: Button [Accept all cookies] is not visible after 30 sec.

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australia', 'Włochy', 'Holandia', 'Opieka Zdrowotna', 'Usługi telekomunikacyjne'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Włochy', 'Holandia']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Francja', 'Holandia', 'Singapur', 'Materiały podstawowe', 'Opieka Zdrowotna'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Singapur']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Wielka Brytania', 'Singapur', 'Hiszpania', 'Przemysł', 'Usługi komunalne'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown,

are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown,
